content: bushy tailed squirrel hope you enjoy this pattern feel free to sell your finished item s not the pattern itself please link back to my ravelry shop for credit of design and pattern also to give credit where it is due the tail is modified from les mailles du rocher https //www instagram com/p/chaqbzhlna0/ so credit this crocheter as well i used loops & threads impeccable yarn which is a medium weight worsted i tend to crochet tightly and this little guy ended up about 7 5 inch tall x 4 inch wide all crocheting is done in continuous rounds no joining except for the tummy & some of the accessories which are crocheted in row the length of yarn left as a tail for assembly are only estimations if you tend to need more or less yarn during assembly please adjust the length appropriately materials terminology & stitches us terminology 3 5 mm hook chain chain yarn color a brown color b beige single_crochet single_crochet small amount of black or brown to half_double_crochet double_crochet embroider nose & paws or use any tc triple crochet other color i used loops & threads increase 2 single_crochet in 1 st impeccable chocolate brown ~200 decrease single_crochet 2 st together i tend to use yd & aran ~11 yd invisible decreases unless noted tapestry needle slip_stitch slip_stitch safety eyes x2 10 mm st stitch polyfill blo back loops only scissors repeat portion in brackets - # total stitches in a round eye patches make 2 yarn b beige round 1 make a magic_ring single_crochet x5 5 round 2 increase slip_stitch x2 4 leave ~6-7 tail for sewing leaning forward to balanc e the heavier tail place safety eye in the center of the magic_ring but don t put backing on yet ears make 2 yarn a brown round 1 make a magic_ring single_crochet x4 4 round 2 increase single_crochet repeat around 6 round 3 increase single_crochet x2 repeat around 8 round 4 single_crochet x8 8 round 5 increase single_crochet x3 repeat around 10 round 6 single_crochet x3 decrease repeat around 8 finish off round with slip_stitch leave ~7-8 tail for sewing head start with yarn b beige and change as indicated to yarn a brown round 1 make a magic_ring single_crochet x6 6 round 2 increase repeat around 12 * round 3 single_crochet x12 12 change to yarn a on last st round 4 single_crochet x3 increase repeat around 15 round 5 single_crochet x2 increase single_crochet x4 increase x2 single_crochet x2 18 round 6 single_crochet x5 increase repeat around 21 round 7 single_crochet x3 increase single_crochet x6 increase x2 single_crochet x3 24 round 8 single_crochet x7 increase repeat around 27 round 9 single_crochet x4 increase single_crochet x8 increase x2 single_crochet x4 30 round 10 single_crochet x4 increase repeat around 36 round 11-12 single_crochet x36 36 round 13 single_crochet x4 decrease repeat around 30 round 14 single_crochet x3 decrease repeat around 24 ears head w/ eyes & eye patches round 15 single_crochet x2 decrease
